description:
In the description of addresses property in the response in Create Server in api reference of Nova [1] there is an extra "`_" in the text.



[1]: http://developer.openstack.org/api-ref/compute/?expanded=create-server-detail
title: Extra characters in create server responses description

comments.content:
In the description of addresses property in the response in Create Server in api reference of Nova [1] there is an extra "`_" in the text.



[1]: http://developer.openstack.org/api-ref/compute/?expanded=create-server-detail

comments.content: Thank you for pointing that out, i am on it. Will be uploading a patch set soon.
